> He turned on his comm to Talos.
>
> Sunhawk:  TALOS, BOTH PREDS ARE LOOSE!  I'M TRYING TO
> RESTRAIN THEM, BUT YOU MIGHT WANT TO SEND HOT ROD BACK
> HERE.  HE WAS SUPPOSE TO GUARD THE FEMALE SO THIS IS
> HIS MESS!  HE SHOULD HELP ME CLEAN IT UP!
>

{Nightshade}

    Nightshade didn't even bother to try and block the grab and sword
placement, rather her hands came up attaching two magnetic and quickly
blinking explosive charges to it's surface. "Surrender, or I blow us all to
space dust Sunhawk. You'll never disarm them before they both blow a gaping
hole in the middle of your ship."

    Turning her head her eye looked back at Sunhawks, "I've nothing to
lose...everything to gain. Stand down or I get the final victory. And you'll
never get out of blast radius before they go off so don't even think of
throwing your sword away and running to 'leave us to our doom'...there's no
escape unless you surrender."
